definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The Bubbler is a sure way to keep your carwash reclaim water smelling fresh and clean.
sentences.chinese: 起泡器可以保持您的清洗車輛的水質乾淨，清香。

sentences.english: Truly, the pure fragrance of tea came out from the tradition of "no sugar".
sentences.chinese: 真的，中國茶的清香和甘甜，全在這不放糖的傳統裏。

sentences.english: Celery juice is tasted with faint scent and can increase people's appetite.
sentences.chinese: 芹菜汁芹菜味道清香，可以增強人的食慾。

sentences.english: Delicately fragranced with Almond Flowers and Honey.
sentences.chinese: 散發淡淡的清香與杏仁花和蜂蜜。

sentences.english: As long as you get closer to the nose longans , a faint scent came on smelling.
sentences.chinese: 你只要把鼻子湊近桂圓，一種淡淡的清香就撲鼻而來。

sentences.english: Wen can see the elegant fragrance, you can taste the long poetic.
sentences.chinese: 可以聞見淡雅的清香，可以品味悠長的詩意。

sentences.english: It was winter, but the air in the campus was fragrant because of winter sweets.
sentences.chinese: 當時是冬天，但校園的空氣因爲臘梅而變得清香。

sentences.english: Vow to be a flower bearing fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 發願作一朵鮮花，吐露芬芳，給人清香。

sentences.english: The fragrance of freshly brewed coffee wafted through the apartment.
sentences.chinese: 剛煮好的咖啡的那種清香，在整個房間裏飄蕩。

sentences.english: Wheat field is full of fragrance overflowing to wheat straw.
sentences.chinese: 麥場上到處是清香四溢地麥秸。

sentences.english: Grass flavor tea fragrance, I love the most was.
sentences.chinese: 茶的草味清香，最得我愛。

sentences.english: Black fruit , spice and fruit compote dominate the nose.
sentences.chinese: 有黑色漿果香，香料味以及果盤的清香。

sentences.english: Have soft water, fog and Lagerstroemia fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 有柔水的霧和紫薇的清香。

sentences.english: With lemon and green apple fragrance and flowers along with honey.
sentences.chinese: 帶檸檬及青蘋果清香伴隨着蜂蜜及花香。

sentences.english: Kennedy heavy wood, fragrance, there are two kinds of yellow and white.
sentences.chinese: 木質堅重，清香，有黃白二種。

sentences.english: The house sends out the smells of the osmanthus.
sentences.chinese: 這樣整個屋子散發出花的清香。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
